Hikari-chan from Rizas,"},{"lineNumber":113147,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誘拐事件のちょっと前からずーーーーっと、","translatedEnglishLine":"  for a long time, even just before the kidnapping incident,"},{"lineNumber":113148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　存在を感知されず追いかけ続けたこの私なのに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I was the one who kept following without being detected!\""},{"lineNumber":113149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなのストーカー失格よ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is disqualification as a stalker!"},{"lineNumber":113150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　腹を切るどころか首斬って死にたい！","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to die not just by seppuku but by having my head cut off!"},{"lineNumber":113151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アーニィちゃんに殺されたランス様のように！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like Lord Rance who was killed by Anny-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":113152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa... haa..."},{"lineNumber":113153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言いたかったこと全部言えて、スッキリ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I said everything I wanted to say, and I feel refreshed...\""},{"lineNumber":113154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとうね、こんな愚痴言えるの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, you're the only one I can vent to like this,"},{"lineNumber":113155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私にとってあなただけだから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  because it's only you for me...\""},{"lineNumber":113156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":113157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょーっとごめん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, excuse me a moment!"},{"lineNumber":113158,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この荒々しいお日様みたいな匂いは――ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This rough, sun-like scent is—!"},{"lineNumber":113159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様の匂いが近づいてくるー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance's scent is approaching!?\""},{"lineNumber":113160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんね、あなた！　また後でねー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, you! See you again later!\""},{"lineNumber":113161,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――","translatedEnglishLine":"A few seconds after Nunuhara suddenly disappeared—"},{"lineNumber":113162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha! The smell of a woman---!\""},{"lineNumber":113163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Moreover! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!"},{"lineNumber":113164,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is she, where is she, where is she---!?\""},{"lineNumber":113165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":113166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? There's no woman here.\""},{"lineNumber":113167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":113168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……","translatedEnglishLine":"To think I, the great me, could miss the scent of a woman..."},{"lineNumber":113169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーーーーん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ummm?\""},{"lineNumber":113170,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tilted his head repeatedly,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、ランス様の周囲はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, not only around Lord Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の人達のこと、魔人や魔王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about the people nearby, the demons and demon lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国の歴史まで調べたわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the country's history, I investigated all of it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、調べれば調べるほど愛は深まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And the more I investigated, the deeper my love grew,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に知りたいと世界の秘密にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and wanting to know more, I reached even for the secrets of the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根性で手を伸ばして、更に好きになった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stretching out my determination, and I loved him even more!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしたら、こう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分でもちょっと異常だと思うんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it's a little abnormal even for myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の観測者側の感覚になっちゃってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I ended up having the perspective of an observer of this world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For example...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の好きな創作世界に入り込むことが出来たら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you could enter your favorite fictional world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはいったい何をする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what exactly would you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仲間の一人になって主人公を助けに助けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Would you become one of the comrades and help the protagonist over and over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物語にがっつり絡むとかする？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: getting deeply involved in the story?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、そういう人もいるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are people like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもね、私は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, you see, I—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は一切絡みたくなーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to get involved at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私如きが絡むとか、おこがましいもんね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone like me getting involved would be presumptuous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だって私はランス様の冒険の異物なのよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I am a foreign element in Lord Rance's adventures!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから絡んだりしたらいけないの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I must not interfere!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、今までずーっと、リーザスの事件の時も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, all this time, whether during the Rizas incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタム埋没した時もリーザス陥落の時も！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Custom embedding, or the fall of Rizas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的に姿を隠し続けていたの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thoroughly kept myself hidden!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、あなたもそう思うでしょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you think so too, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は私イラーピュの事件の時こっそりいたからね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, I was secretly there during the Illapyu incident!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほら！　今あなた少しがっかりしたでしょ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See! You just got a little disappointed, didn't you!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それくらいの後から情報魔法技術使いまくりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From around then on, I used information magic technology extensively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できるだけ現地に行くのすら抑えてきたの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to avoid going to the site as much as possible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーカーなのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A stalker!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なのに……」
「それが気づけばランス様の仲間の一人よ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before I knew it, I became one of Lord Rance's companions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことってある！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does something like this happen!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん！　リーザスのヒカリちゃんさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aah! Hikari-chan from Rizas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誘拐事件のちょっと前からずーーーーっと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for a long time, even just before the kidnapping incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在を感知されず追いかけ続けたこの私なのに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was the one who kept following without being detected!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのストーカー失格よ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is disqualification as a stalker!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を切るどころか首斬って死にたい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to die not just by seppuku but by having my head cut off!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アーニィちゃんに殺されたランス様のように！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like Lord Rance who was killed by Anny-chan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... haa...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いたかったこと全部言えて、スッキリ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I said everything I wanted to say, and I feel refreshed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとうね、こんな愚痴言えるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you, you're the only one I can vent to like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にとってあなただけだから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because it's only you for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーっとごめん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, excuse me a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この荒々しいお日様みたいな匂いは――ッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This rough, sun-like scent is—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様の匂いが近づいてくるー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance's scent is approaching!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、あなた！　また後でねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, you! See you again later!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few seconds after Nunuhara suddenly disappeared—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! The smell of a woman---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is she, where is she, where is she---!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? There's no woman here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I, the great me, could miss the scent of a woman...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ummm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tilted his head repeatedly,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、ランス様の周囲はもちろん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, not only around Lord Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の人達のこと、魔人や魔王、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about the people nearby, the demons and demon lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国の歴史まで調べたわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the country's history, I investigated all of it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、調べれば調べるほど愛は深まり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And the more I investigated, the deeper my love grew,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に知りたいと世界の秘密にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and wanting to know more, I reached even for the secrets of the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根性で手を伸ばして、更に好きになった！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stretching out my determination, and I loved him even more!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしたら、こう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分でもちょっと異常だと思うんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it's a little abnormal even for myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の観測者側の感覚になっちゃってね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I ended up having the perspective of an observer of this world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For example...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の好きな創作世界に入り込むことが出来たら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you could enter your favorite fictional world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはいったい何をする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what exactly would you do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「仲間の一人になって主人公を助けに助けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Would you become one of the comrades and help the protagonist over and over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物語にがっつり絡むとかする？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: getting deeply involved in the story?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、そういう人もいるわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are people like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でもね、私は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, you see, I—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は一切絡みたくなーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to get involved at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私如きが絡むとか、おこがましいもんね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone like me getting involved would be presumptuous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だって私はランス様の冒険の異物なのよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I am a foreign element in Lord Rance's adventures!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから絡んだりしたらいけないの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I must not interfere!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、今までずーっと、リーザスの事件の時も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, all this time, whether during the Rizas incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタム埋没した時もリーザス陥落の時も！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Custom embedding, or the fall of Rizas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的に姿を隠し続けていたの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thoroughly kept myself hidden!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、あなたもそう思うでしょ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you think so too, right!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は私イラーピュの事件の時こっそりいたからね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, I was secretly there during the Illapyu incident!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほら！　今あなた少しがっかりしたでしょ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See! You just got a little disappointed, didn't you!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それくらいの後から情報魔法技術使いまくりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From around then on, I used information magic technology extensively,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できるだけ現地に行くのすら抑えてきたの！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tried to avoid going to the site as much as possible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーカーなのよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A stalker!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な……なのに……」
「それが気づけばランス様の仲間の一人よ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Before I knew it, I became one of Lord Rance's companions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことってある！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Does something like this happen!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーん！　リーザスのヒカリちゃんさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aah! Hikari-chan from Rizas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誘拐事件のちょっと前からずーーーーっと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for a long time, even just before the kidnapping incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在を感知されず追いかけ続けたこの私なのに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was the one who kept following without being detected!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのストーカー失格よ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is disqualification as a stalker!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を切るどころか首斬って死にたい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to die not just by seppuku but by having my head cut off!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アーニィちゃんに殺されたランス様のように！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like Lord Rance who was killed by Anny-chan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... haa...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いたかったこと全部言えて、スッキリ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I said everything I wanted to say, and I feel refreshed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとうね、こんな愚痴言えるの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you, you're the only one I can vent to like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私にとってあなただけだから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because it's only you for me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょーっとごめん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, excuse me a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この荒々しいお日様みたいな匂いは――ッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This rough, sun-like scent is—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様の匂いが近づいてくるー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance's scent is approaching!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、あなた！　また後でねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, you! See you again later!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヌヌハラがぴゅーっと姿を消した数秒後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few seconds after Nunuhara suddenly disappeared—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　女の匂いーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha! The smell of a woman---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも！　これはまだ俺が抱いてない女の匂い！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover! This is the scent of a woman I haven't embraced yet!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこだどこだどこだーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is she, where is she, where is she---!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おや？　女なんていないぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? There's no woman here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が女の匂いを掴み損なうとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think I, the great me, could miss the scent of a woman...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ummm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何度も首をかしげながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tilted his head repeatedly,
